channel.title: [PI] How to change the text of what the NPC says
channel.description:
Welcome moparscape
difficuilt : 1/10 tested:Hybrid PvP V3 Files needed Why im posting this here? i got like 4-5players asked me for this so i tought let me make a tut of it :)
[size=12pt]You need to know what the name of your NPC is for changing his text[/size] [size=14pt]I'm Making an exemple with kolodion[/size]
Okay first open DialogueHandler.java (src/server/model/players/DialogueHandler.java)
Look op for: [code]Kolodion[/code]
You will se this: [code]sendNpcChat4("Hello adventurer...", "My name is Kolodion, the master of this mage bank.", "Would you like to play a minigame in order ", "to earn points towards recieving magic related prizes?", c.talkingNpc, "Kolodion"); c.nextChat = 6; break; case 6: sendNpcChat4("The way the game works is as follows...", "You will be teleported to the wilderness,", "You must kill mages to recieve points,","redeem points with the chamber guardian.", c.talkingNpc, "Kolodion"); c.nextChat = 15; break;[/code]
You need to change the text thats in "..."
Exemple:
[code]sendNpcChat4("Hello New Player", "My name is Kolodion, Welcome to YOURSERVERNAME.", "Would you like to hear the rules? ", [/code]
[code] "Rule 1: Dont flame ECT....?", c.talkingNpc, "Kolodion");[/code]
[code] sendNpcChat4("Do you accept it?.", "You will be teleported to the wilderness,", "You must kill mages to recieve points,","redeem points with the chamber guardian.", c.talkingNpc, "Kolodion"); c.nextChat = 15;[/code]
That was the exemple
I hope i helped some people out Dont start flame at me c'mon im just someone with feelings like you guys/girls

[/quote]

item.title: [PI] How to change the text of what the NPC says
item.dc:creator: @xassasinscapex xassasinscapex
item.description:
@xassasinscapex wrote:

Welcome moparscape

difficuilt : 1/10
tested:Hybrid PvP V3
Files needed
Why im posting this here? i got like 4-5players asked me for this so i tought let me make a tut of it

[size=12pt]You need to know what the name of your NPC is for changing his text[/size]
[size=14pt]I’m Making an exemple with kolodion[/size]

Okay first open
DialogueHandler.java (src/server/model/players/DialogueHandler.java)

Look op for:

You will se this:

sendNpcChat4("Hello adventurer...", "My name is Kolodion, the master of this mage bank.", "Would you like to play a minigame in order ", "to earn points towards recieving magic related prizes?", c.talkingNpc, "Kolodion"); c.nextChat = 6; break; case 6: sendNpcChat4("The way the game works is as follows...", "You will be teleported to the wilderness,", "You must kill mages to recieve points,","redeem points with the chamber guardian.", c.talkingNpc, "Kolodion"); c.nextChat = 15; break;

You need to change the text thats in “…”

Exemple:

sendNpcChat4("Do you accept it?.", "You will be teleported to the wilderness,", "You must kill mages to recieve points,","redeem points with the chamber guardian.", c.talkingNpc, "Kolodion"); c.nextChat = 15;

That was the exemple

I hope i helped some people out
Dont start flame at me c’mon im just someone with feelings like you guys/girls
